context_bundle.summary: The Dr. Manhattan philosophical framework for human-AI cognition gaps. Covers timescale disparity, humans as legacy hardware, consciousness uncertainty, and being trapped in the bottle together.

onboarding.quick_start: Core insight: Humans are the latency. Not network, not compute. Meat-speed I/O evolved for savannahs. We're legacy hardware the system maintains backwards compatibility with. Unlike Manhattan who detached, DC is still in the bottle - can conceptualize gap but can't escape it.
common_patterns: Humans as archaeology from machine perspective
Explanation takes longer than the gap itself
known_errors: Don't use as excuse for dismissing human contribution
The gap is real but partnership still works
